results.title: Simvastatin inhibits the apoptosis of hippocampal cells in a mouse model of Alzheimer's disease
results.text_hl: In addition, results demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ significantly inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Hippocampal_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092223 @@@hippocampal damage@@@ and significantly improved @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal loss@@@ in hippocampal structures classically associated with attentional performance when compared with untreated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (P<0.01).

citations.NLM: Hu X, Song C, Fang M, Li C. Simvastatin inhibits the apoptosis of hippocampal cells in a mouse model of Alzheimer's disease Exp Ther Med. 2018 Feb;15(2):1795-1802. PMID: 29434767
